lines.text: What did you want to be when you were that age?
Batman? Even then you wanted to be a crimefighter.
Nah, I just wanted to be in the Justice League so I could hang out with Superman, Green Lantern, and the Flash.
I figure we're not supposed to make it better. We're just supposed to keep it from getting worse.
Well, they do. Their values, I think, are going to shape the country. We just gotta teach them good values before the bad guys teach them bad values.
Sweetheart, what about tomorrow? And the day after that? And the day after that?
Lately I've been having a hard time turning off being a cop.
